content: this is a top/cuff down sock the lea socks classic simple that s how i describe the lea socks it s the kind of sock that leaves you wanting more it s easy to memorize easy project to take on-the-go and any tonal solid or variegated yarn would look lovely on her she s super fun to make this sock pattern is perfect for your 30 minutes of knitting every morning it works up fast skill level beginner sock knitter or anyone comfortable with knitting in the round chart never all of my patterns are written for ease of reading language standard american knit terms written in english yarn fingering weight/sock yarn a homespun house soft sock - sock set was used for this sample category 1 needles us size 1/2 25mm i use dpns size adult women size medium width approx shoe size u s 6-10 39-42 euro a craft yarn council chart has been provided to help you determine the length of your sock based on your foot size most of my socks have one cast on for an average width foot keep in mind socks stretch so this is rarely a problem some have more sizes depending on the sock
